full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

**Title**
F5561-220900 Marine Searchlights

**Reference Number**
WS4060536011-Doc4071768679

**Solicitation Number**
WS4060536011

**Notice Type**
Request for Proposal (RFP) - Competitive Open Bidding

**Description**
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans requires the procurement of two (2) marine searchlights for the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Jean Goodwill.

**Closing Date and Time**
July 13, 2023, 14:00:00

**Amendment Number**
1

**Background**
The contract will be awarded to the bidder submitting the lowest priced proposal that meets the requirements outlined in this RFP.

**Regions of Delivery**
The searchlights must be delivered to Nova Scotia, Canada.

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**

* Quentin Crocker, Public Works and Government Services Canada
* E-mail: [quentin.crocker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:quentin.crocker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**NOTICE**

This announcement is for a Request for Proposal (RFP). All interested bidders must submit their proposals to the Department of Public Works and Government Services by the closing date mentioned in the solicitation document. Registration information for this RFP is available through this link.

### Tender Categories

* UNSPSC: 
	+ 25111603: Rescue ships or boats
	+ 25111900: Marine craft systems and subassemblies
	+ 39111600: Exterior lighting fixtures and accessories
	+ 78141703: Marine navigational or communication services

* UNSPSC Category:
	+ All of the above codes are assigned to Geo MAC (all of the codes above and that matches to a geographic area).

* CFTA Category:
	+ All of the codes above are categorized under a North American Industrial Classification System.
